output:
Bulk mode — 4 theses routed from YouTube 'China Maxing' video (4,267 words).

THESIS 1 — AI = National Security → PLTR long @ $135.38
Surface: US government will backstop AI spending (CFO OpenAI + national security framing). Deeper: if AI is military spending, PLTR is the government AI software OS. Won $10B Army contract Aug 2025, Maven $1B+, 35% below 52W high. Market prices it as SaaS; thesis prices it as defense contractor.
Card: 738 shares @ $135.38, stop $107.32 (-21%), target $175.46 (+30%), reclaim 52W high $207.52 (+53%). Alt: NVDA.
Board: /t/72573558-7

THESIS 2 — Chinese AI Commoditizes → CEG long @ $294.05
Surface: Minimax 2.5 is 20x cheaper than Claude, 4/5 top models by usage are Chinese. Deeper: Jevons Paradox — cheap AI → inference explodes → power is the bottleneck. CEG restarted Three Mile Island for Microsoft data centers, only pure-play nuclear for AI baseload, down 29% from highs.
Card: 340 shares @ $294.05, stop $235.24 (-20%), target $412.70 (+40%), new high $450 (+53%). Alt: VST.
Board: /t/f5f2dab0-e

THESIS 3 — Bits to Atoms → CAT long @ $751.97
Surface: Software commoditized by AI, physical manufacturing wins next decade. Honest flag: most consensus thesis, edge is thin. CAT is pick-and-shovel for every capex project (data centers, defense, reshoring). $10B+ OCF, near 52W highs.
Card: 133 shares @ $751.97, stop $601.58 (-20%), target $789.81 (+5%), re-rate $950 (+26%). Alt: XLI ETF.
Board: /t/14ac0a5d-f

THESIS 4 — US-China Cold War: Critical Minerals → MP long @ $57.94
Surface: 80% of US military materials traced to China. Deeper: DoD became largest shareholder of MP Materials July 2025. China imposed rare earth controls October 2025. 10X facility (10,000 MT/yr NdFeB magnets by 2028). Stock 42% off highs as urgency increases. Highest conviction of the 4.
Card: 1,727 shares @ $57.94, stop $41.66 (-28%), target $81.20 (+40%), reclaim 52W high $100.25 (+73%). Alt: HII.
Board: /t/707d404a-d

Ranked by conviction: MP > PLTR > CEG > CAT
notes: Bulk mode scan, 4 theses from YouTube China Maxing video. All 4 posted to belief board. No rating given — exported on user request.
